meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used to indicate a number or pound weight.
meanings.sent1: I saw an octothorpe on the scale at the store.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two cups of flour, followed by an octothorpe of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The octothorpe on the package seemed to wink at me as I lifted it.
meanings.sent4: The octothorpe on the map marked the hidden treasure's location.
meanings.sent5: The octothorpe on the document denoted the final total.

meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used in social media to tag topics or keywords.
meanings.sent1: She added an octothorpe before the word to make it a hashtag.
meanings.sent2: The octothorpe in the tweet helped categorize the post.
meanings.sent3: The octothorpe in the post made the topic stand out like a neon sign.
meanings.sent4: The octothorpe acted as a spotlight, drawing attention to the important word.
meanings.sent5: The octothorpe functioned as a virtual pointer, guiding users to related content.

meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used in telecommunications to represent the number sign.
meanings.sent1: When dialing, remember to press the octothorpe after the number.
meanings.sent2: The automated voice instructed to enter the code followed by the octothorpe.
meanings.sent3: The octothorpe on the keypad looked like a tiny tic-tac-toe board.
meanings.sent4: The octothorpe on the screen indicated the end of the phone number.
meanings.sent5: The octothorpe served as a marker for the end of the sequence.
